summary:
CatNap COVID-19 Update - Thursday, June 25th, 2020

 About CatNap - CatNap is a private, nonprofit organization dedicated to creating lifelong relationships between companion animals and their adoptive families. We will provide shelter and care to all healthy and treatable relinquished, abandoned or transferred cats, birds and small mammals until we can bring the adopter and animal together for a lasting relationship.  We also have a low cost clinic on site to provide low cost spay and neuter services, as well as other veterinary care, to rescues, TNR groups and the general community.
